snippet: Relatives of political prisoners and 30 organizations called on President Obama to use his summit meeting with President Xi Jinping to highlight the issue of human rights abuses in China.
abstract: Relatives of political prisoners and 30 organizations call on Pres Obama to use his summit meeting with Chinese Pres Xi Jinping to highlight issue of human rights abuses in China; urge him to appeal for release of 16 prominent prisoners jailed for political reasons, including Liu Xiaobo, winner of the Nobel Peace Prize in 2010.

byline.original: By STEVEN LEE MYERS and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: Relatives of political prisoners and 30 organizations called on President Obama to use his summit meeting with President Xi Jinping to highlight the issue of human rights abuses in China.

headline.seo: Obama Urged to Prod China on Human Rights
headline.main: Obama Urged to Prod China on Rights at Meeting
headline.print_headline: Obama Urged To Prod China On Rights At Meeting

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
